# [FEAT] CSAT Surveys

## Labels
`reporting`, `customer-experience`, `priority:high`

## Description
Implement Customer Satisfaction (CSAT) surveys to measure support quality.

## Requirements

### Survey Delivery
- Automatic survey after ticket resolution
- Email-based surveys
- In-app surveys
- Chat/messaging surveys
- Configurable timing

### Survey Format
- Rating scale (1-5, 1-10)
- Emoji/icon ratings
- Good/Bad binary
- Optional comment field
- Custom questions

### Survey Configuration
- Enable/disable per channel
- Survey frequency limits
- Exclusion rules
- Custom survey messages
- Multi-language support

### Response Collection
- One-click response
- Anonymous option
- Response confirmation
- Follow-up options
- Negative response routing

### CSAT Reporting
- Overall CSAT score
- CSAT by agent
- CSAT by group/team
- CSAT trends over time
- CSAT by ticket type
- CSAT by channel
- Response rate tracking

### Actions
- Alert on negative ratings
- Trigger workflows on feedback
- Reopen ticket on negative
- Manager notifications

## Zendesk Reference
Zendesk's integration of Customer Satisfaction (CSAT) surveys allows businesses to seamlessly gather customer feedback, with automated surveys sent after ticket resolution.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Surveys sent automatically
- [ ] Response collection works
- [ ] CSAT reporting available
- [ ] Negative rating alerts work
- [ ] Multi-channel support
